startLocation.address: Connaught Place, New Delhi, Delhi, India

name: The Golden Triangle
summary: Explore the iconic cities of Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur
description: Experience the rich cultural heritage and architectural wonders of India's Golden Triangle. From the bustling streets of Delhi to the magnificent Taj Mahal in Agra and the royal palaces of Jaipur, this tour will take you on a journey through India's history and beauty. Immerse yourself in the vibrant colors, flavors, and traditions of this incredible country.

startLocation.address: Gateway of India, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

name: Mystical Mumbai
description: Experience the vibrant energy and diverse culture of Mumbai, India's largest city. From the iconic Gateway of India to the bustling markets of Colaba and the historic sites of Elephanta Caves, this tour will take you on a journey through the heart of Mumbai. Explore the city's architectural marvels, indulge in delicious street food, and immerse yourself in the local traditions and customs.

name: Colors of Jaipur
description: Immerse yourself in the enchanting beauty and vibrant colors of Jaipur, the Pink City of India. From the magnificent palaces and forts to the bustling markets and ancient temples, this tour will take you on a journey through Jaipur's rich history and culture. Explore the architectural marvels, savor the delicious Rajasthani cuisine, and witness the traditional art forms of this royal city.

name: Goa Beaches and Waterfalls
summary: Discover the stunning beaches and waterfalls of Goa
description: Experience the perfect blend of sun, sand, and waterfalls on this tour of Goa. Relax on the sandy beaches, indulge in thrilling water sports, and witness the beauty of Goa's famous waterfalls. Enjoy the vibrant nightlife, savor delicious seafood, and create unforgettable memories in this tropical paradise.

name: Backwaters and Wildlife
summary: Explore the serene backwaters and encounter wildlife in Kerala
description: Embark on a journey through the tranquil backwaters of Alleppey, Kerala. Cruise along the serene canals, witness the traditional way of life, and stay in charming houseboats. Visit the famous Kumarakom Bird Sanctuary and explore the wildlife-rich Periyar National Park, home to elephants, tigers, and various bird species.

startLocation.address: Parmarth Niketan Ashram, Rishikesh, Uttarakhand, India

name: Spiritual Journey in Rishikesh
summary: Embark on a spiritual journey in the holy city of Rishikesh
description: Discover inner peace and tranquility in the spiritual haven of Rishikesh. Practice yoga and meditation in the serene surroundings, visit ancient temples and ashrams, and take part in the mesmerizing Ganga Aarti ceremony. Immerse yourself in the teachings of renowned spiritual gurus and rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul.

startLocation.address: Victoria Memorial, Kolkata, West Bengal, India

name: Cultural Delights of Kolkata
summary: Experience the rich cultural heritage of Kolkata
description: Immerse yourself in the cultural treasures of Kolkata, the cultural capital of India. Explore the iconic Victoria Memorial, visit historic temples and palaces, stroll through the vibrant streets of Kumartuli, and indulge in the delicious flavors of Bengali cuisine. Witness traditional dance performances, discover the art scene, and embrace the warm hospitality of the locals.

startLocation.address: Marina Beach, Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India

name: Enchanting Chennai
description: Discover the charm and cultural heritage of Chennai, the gateway to South India. From the picturesque Marina Beach to the magnificent temples of Mahabalipuram and the bustling streets of Mylapore, this tour will introduce you to the rich history, art, and cuisine of Chennai. Immerse yourself in the local traditions, witness classical dance performances, and savor the authentic flavors of South Indian cuisine.

name: Sun, Sand, and Serenity in Goa
summary: Experience the beauty of Goa's beaches
description: Escape to the tropical paradise of Goa and unwind on its stunning beaches. From the vibrant Baga Beach to the serene Palolem Beach and the historic charm of Old Goa, this tour will offer you a perfect blend of relaxation and exploration. Indulge in water sports, taste the delicious Goan cuisine, and immerse yourself in the laid-back vibes of this coastal haven.

name: The Golden Triangle
summary: Discover the rich heritage of India's Golden Triangle
description:
The Golden Triangle tour takes you on a journey through the three iconic cities of India - Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur. Experience the rich heritage, vibrant culture, and architectural wonders of these cities.

In Delhi, explore historical sites such as the Red Fort, Jama Masjid, and Qutub Minar. Discover the bustling markets and taste the diverse street food.

In Agra, visit the magnificent Taj Mahal, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, and explore the Agra Fort.

In Jaipur, known as the Pink City, admire the stunning architecture of Hawa Mahal, visit the majestic Amber Fort, and immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture.

This tour is an unforgettable journey through India's history and cultural treasures.

name: The Majestic Western Ghats
summary: Embark on a challenging trek through the Western Ghats
description:
The Majestic Western Ghats tour offers a thrilling trekking experience through the picturesque landscapes of the Western Ghats in Maharashtra. Explore dense forests, cascading waterfalls, and serene lakes.

Start your journey from Mumbai and trek through the Sahyadri range. Witness breathtaking views from the peaks, encounter diverse flora and fauna, and camp amidst the wilderness.

This tour is designed for adventure enthusiasts who seek to challenge themselves and immerse in the natural beauty of the Western Ghats.
